title: Retrieve a Historic Non-FHL UK Property Business Annual Submission
description: This endpoint allows a developer to retrieve the income from adjustments and allowances for their non-FHL UK property business for tax years up to 2021-22. A National Insurance number and tax year must be provided.

annualAdjustments.description: Object containing the details about annual adjustments.

lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years.

privateUseAdjustment.description: Private use adjustment on an asset by a sole trader or partner in a partnership, the asset is put in to a single-asset pool and allowances are restricted on the business to private-use ratio.

balancingCharge.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value).

businessPremisesRenovationAllowanceBalan.description: Income from the sale or grant of a long lease for a premium of renovated business premises within 7 years of first use.

nonResidentLandlord.description: A boolean to identify that the user is a Non-Resident Landlord.

rentARoom.description: Object holding UK FHL Rent A Room income shared.

jointlyLet.description: A boolean to identify that the Rent A Room income (RAR) is shared with another individual.

annualAllowances.description: An object containing the details about annual allowances.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description: The amount claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to the maximum annual amount.

zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description: The number of zero-emissions goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: The allowance amount for renovation or conversion of derelict business properties.

costOfReplacingDomesticGoods.description: Cost of Replacing Domestic Items - formerly Wear and Tear allowance.

propertyIncomeAllowance.description: The amount of tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property.
